text:
DEPARTMENT OF
HEALTH, EDUCATION, AND WELFARE
OFFICE OF EDUCATION
WASHINGTON 25. D.C.
October 3, 1963
Mrs. Marian Corwell
Associate Director
Office of School Relations
Dearborn Public Schools
Dearborn, Michigan 48120
Dear Marian:
After having neglected you so shamefully, I am surprised
that you still consider me a member of your committee' ]
certainly will try to make amends when I see you in
Milwaukee. I do have a conflict for lunch on Wednesday,
November 20, which I may or may not be able to shift. I
will try but if I am not successful, I promise to be on
hand for the "more serious session" afterward.
It will be good to see you again aft * " â€™ le.
Educational Media Specialist
s.) Gertrude G. Broderick
